channel.title: CiTR -- Kol Nodedi
channel.description: World Music of beautiful arresting beats and voices emanating from all continents and corners. Seldom-rattled pocketfuls of roots and gems, recalling other times and other places, to vast crossroads en route to the unknown and the un-claimable. Features world music with Jewish/Israeli, Middle Eastern, Balkan, Gypsy, and Latin slant. Ancient melodies to remixed electronica and fusion. Always crossing borders, always transporting.
channel.itunes:summary: World Music of beautiful arresting beats and voices emanating from all continents and corners. channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver
